website_summaries.verdict: This is a tool that allows parents to work swiftly in alleviating babies of their stuffy noses and save money without the need for filters.
pros: This nasal aspirator uses a tissue as a filter rather than having to purchase separately
Works quickly to reduce time spent using, and to offer instant relief
Purchase is accompanied by breathable storage bag
cons: Product does not come with written instructions for use

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I tried many other things, but this is the only one works to remove her mucus. I spray saline nasal mist in her nose, let it sit for a couple of minutes while I'm putting half klinex in the aspirator. Then the mucus comes out with one or two aspiration. The mucus has never passed 1/4 of the aspirator, and staying under the klinex. Easy to clean, running in tap water, soap, rinse, and done. I am so glad I got this, so my baby can breath, eat, and sleep well.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is second nasal aspirator I bought, I already have one for my older child. I went through couple nose cleaning products in the past and this one is the best. You can use a tissue as a filter and after you are done just simply throw the tissue away and rinse the aspirator with water- it is so easy to clean! Perfect for newborns and older kids!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Z

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very helpful for us: - It has a bigger container than most other ones that only target for babies. We have a 5 year old and a 3 year old who still need help some times to get the stuff that they can't blow out. This can contain a lot with the napkin catches everything - It is very easy to use. We use saline spray first, then with this to clean everything out - It is very easy to clean as everything can be open up
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Best nose sucker ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best nose suction ever! So easy to use. Way better than the electronic ones I used before. I love the tissue filter idea, so we can all save money on filters. I wish I know this sooner when my first kid was born, otherwise I would have gotten many goodnight sleeps. But better late than never. I love it! You need good lungs to suck this though. I ran out of air because the hose was kind if too long for me. I made my husband do the job everytime. He have better lungs, more air. Sorry about the booger in the picture, but it is what it is LOL.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: This has alot more suction power than the old bulb style suction devices!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 month old grandson because his nose has been really stuffy lately. This has helped so much!! The old style bulb suction devices do not have enough suction power to clear his nose but this device works really good. I especially like that you can use regular tissue as a filter, unlike similar products that you have to buy their filters. I don't know how I ever raised my four (now adult) children without one of these! lol.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: The most helpful baby essential.
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you, this is by far the most useful baby essential you can buy. I made something similar while waiting for this, but once I tried this one, can't change it. My 3 month baby has her nose clean, all the time. Be careful, be gentle a little suction power in more than enough, always apply some nose solution before sucking.
customer_reviews.author: JuandeDios

customer_reviews.title: So helpful when baby/toddler is stuffy!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is top of my baby recommendation list! It works so much better than the bulbs. And I love the shape. You don’t have to worry about putting to far into nose. (Preferred over Freda style). It’s a lifesaver when the nose is stuffed up! I used ours with the first kid (she’s 8 now) and got a new one for the baby. Like magic.
customer_reviews.author: B. Henke

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is immensely better than the nose frida. The newborn suction attachment is especially useful for those tiny little baby noses. Both attachments are much softer plastic than the hard plastic of the nose friday, and the ability to just use a tissue as the filter is awesome. Just used this for the first time after sanitizing it, and already I would give it the full 5 stars. It is also important though, just like the nose frida, to use saline to lubricate the boogies in those little noses before suctioning stuff out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer CB

customer_reviews.title: Works great, knocked off a point for build quality
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed but of the different tips you can use, one was super squished/defective and unusable. The hose has some kind of powdery textured finish that is unpleasant in user’s hands and mouth. But again, it works well and doesn’t scare baby as bad as the sucker bulbs do.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: The part where it holds the snot doesn’t close. I have to either tape it or hold it together while trying to do the suction. We ‘be tried 2 other types and this is the worst one. Don’t get this! Just get the nose frida, even though you have to get filters but at least it works.
customer_reviews.author: Meg D

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: My baby hated this thing but it has been helpful in getting hard to reach boogies because of it’s long tip. The tip that goes in babies nose has stained yellow after a couple of uses despite sterilizing. Cannot completely clean tip by rinsing, boiling, blowing into it, will not continue to use for long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best nasal aspirator!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these over the years. They're fantastic gifts for new parents. I like the variable tips to grow with baby. I LOVE that unlike others on the market (I'm looking at you nosefrida) there's no filters to buy. You just put a tissue in it and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kim A

customer_reviews.title: Very useful product.
customer_reviews.text: I will carry it with my baby to everywhere we need to go. It works when you need it. like the price as well. Updating: I've used it for a couple times. The bigger tip works great for sucking anything in baby's nose, and the smaller one works for getting things in baby's mouth. Very easy to use, clean, and carry with. Must have it!
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but don’t bend base
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this a full 5 stars, but unfortunately I can’t due to the base of the tubing where it connects. It gets bent after time (5 months), thus, making it difficult to actually suck air. You must keep the tube straight or else it won’t work. This can be challenging with a squirmy baby. A better quality and thicker tubing might be the solution. This thing works wonders when working properly and I love that there are no filters needed.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a suggestion from my Veterinarian because my cat was super congested and not eating. I never thought I would have to siphon snot out of my cat, but this product worked great and surprisingly, my kitty tolerated it! I went with this product over the NoseFrida because it came with the newborn size attachment. This isn't just a great product for babies, but an amazing idea if you have a feline friend who is congested from chronic upper respiratory infections!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this but I wish it was easier to clean. I like being able to see that I'm sucking out snot (literally) and not just blindly using the bulb ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Works. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. We have purchased multiples to keep in a diaper bag and each floor of the house. Much easier to use and more effective than the old style bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: itslow

customer_reviews.title: Put down the nose Frida and buy this
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ergonomic design and easy to assemble. So much easier to handle with my already unhappy and discomforted son and his wriggling around. The nose Frida always felt like I was holding a pen and couldn’t get a decent grip to clear his nasal passage. The additional pieces are nice and are formed comfortably for little noses so you don’t use as hard of plastic material up against their faces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Boogy Sucker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this boogy sucker! I hated the one they sent home with me from the hospital, it literally didn't do anything for my son, who was a month early and has a little nose. This has a newborn tip included that is the perfect size. I'd post the pic of the Texas size boogy I got out of his nose a couple days ago, but I don't want to gross anyone out lol... needless to say, this gets the job done and now my son can breathe better. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: DaksMomma

customer_reviews.title: HANDS DOWN the best one!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the nasal aspirators I've used, this is HANDS DOWN the best one. Easy to use, works incredibly well, and easy to clean! No need to buy all of the extra filters and it's a fraction of the cost of those "other guys". I feel better prepared for this cold and flu season with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly McNabb

customer_reviews.title: Good but nose tips are hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, my only complaint is I wish the small nose piece was more squishy and not so hard. Otherwise I would’ve given it 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ulsky

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. I love the fact that you can use tissue and not have to purchase filters. Works really well and I’m going to buy another one for my diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Talin

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Had this going on two years with my second child also and it's working really well. Kids aren't fond of it but it's helped them when they have colds and it's very easy to clean !
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Schlaudt

customer_reviews.title: BEST Mouth Suction Nasal Aspirator!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I have owned two. I lost my first and couldn't live without it, so I had to buy another. It has a small adapter perfect for newborns in addition to the normal size. For parents on the fence between this and the other kind of mouth suction nasal aspirator go with this one. The Baby ComfyNose Nasal Aspirator is so much better no filters just tissue (snot does not get past the tissue I promise).
customer_reviews.author: Rai

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best thing I’ve purchased for my son. Super easy to use and I’ve been able to completely clear out my 6 mo olds congestion. Everyone do yourself a favor and buy this now.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Very easy to get the boggies out! My daughter hates it! It’s much easier then the blue ones you get from the hospital. I have never eaten a bogger either!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I was a little sceptical at first but now i own 2!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't so sure that this would be much better than the bulb they give you in the hospital but I was so wrong. It works so well that I bought a 2nd one just fit backup. Super easy to use and clean (and I even toss it in the dishwasher occasionally). No filters involved which adds to the already money saving value. This is my new "go to gift" for new parents.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for our 3 month old and honestly the idea of sucking snots of your child's nose using your own mouth pretty much weirded me out completely. That being said, after a few tries, it was clear that this thing is way better than those classic blue ball nose suckers you see in hospitals and every CVS.
customer_reviews.author: Eek

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. So much better than a regular bulb sucker! I discovered these when my 4yo was a baby and incredibly sick, so when my 4mo got sick, I had to find one immediately. I highly recommend these to every mom with a little one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Osteen

customer_reviews.title: he doesn't cry like he does with the bulb syringe
customer_reviews.text: This little thing has gotten us through several colds already, and I've purchased more than one so we have backups just in case. SO handy with colds and gunky noses, and while my son fails and tries to toss his head while I use it, he doesn't cry like he does with the bulb syringe. I really think this hurts less, which is good... because it does a far better job. It's also nice that one can use a tissue (or cotton ball, I've found) as a filter, because it makes cleanup afterward simple. One of my new favorite baby shower go-to gifts, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: ABWall

customer_reviews.title: Must-have!
customer_reviews.text: I was a huge lover of the Nose Frieda, but this has converted me! Its design is SO much better than anything else on the market. It has different sizes for toddlers vs newborns. It's effective and helps my kiddos sleep. It's easier to clean than the nose Frieda and doesn't require expensive filters.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: A must for any new baby!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Comfy Nose for all 3 of my kids (until they can blow their nose on their own). We moved and one of the pieces to the original ComfyNose was lost so I went to Walmart and bought a similar contraption...but I could not get it to work at all! I ordered a new ComfyNose that day. Infant congestion is no joke and you need more than the bulb sucker thing they give you at the hospital!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Walnofer

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a parent of a little one and you don't have this. Get it. I tried The NoseFrida and I don't see how it works at all. The baby comfy nose is the best nasal aspirator on the market. I can't say enough. I have 3. One for me, my husband and my mom / babysitter :-)
customer_reviews.author: RS Teacher

customer_reviews.title: I use it on my cat, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my cat that has nasal congestion and it works great! Exactly as expected, I wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: iRon Garage

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using one for a few years now. Finally had to buy a new one and I was pleasantly surprised because the new one is even better than the old one was. Works great and my little guy doesn’t mind it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul PM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I still have better luck using other techniques getting those little boogers out of my tiny daughters nose but it does work sometimes!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyx Mielke

customer_reviews.title: Baby Comfy Nasal Aspirator
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST THING THAT EVER COULD HAVE BEEN INVENTED FOR INFANTS AND BABIES. I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY GRAND DAUGHTER BCUS I ALWAYS HATED THE STORE N HOSPITAL SUCTIONS N THE BABIES DOES TOO. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCTS ESPECIALLY FOR NEW MOMS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I have been using it on my kiddos for 4 years and have bought two for expecting mommies, and sing its praises to them! I far prefer the BabyComfyNose to other similar products because it's SO easy to clean and you don't have to buy new filters, or wash off snot stuck in filters, you just add a single square of toilet paper at each use. Love this product and can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: clyman11

customer_reviews.title: Better than Nose Frida
customer_reviews.text: The silicone tip on this makes this product the best! Trust and do!
customer_reviews.author: Vdmgrad09

customer_reviews.title: Buy this before you purchase any other kind of aspirations!!!
customer_reviews.text: We used this aspiration with our first and loved it! It gets everything out of the sinuses and clears baby and toddler right up with the two nasal attachments. I also love that I don’t have to buy any extra filters for it and can use whatever I have handy (tissue, toilet paper, baby wipe, etc). The carry-all pouch is also great for helping us keep the pieces together! So easy to clean and use!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This didnt work like the snot sucker name brand one. Not at all. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rae Pels

customer_reviews.title: Great infant tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect item to help my infants stuffy nose. Very clean and convenient to use tissue as the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Greatttt!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected. Awesome suction little device at a great price. No need of buying filters, a plane paper towel will do the work.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo D

customer_reviews.title: Good boogie sucker that doesn't need expensive filters
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is in daycare and is always sick. Bulb syringes didn't work so we tried a few other suction devices. This one was okay. It is nice because you don't need to purchase filters like other types. Also, the long tubing and piece of tissue that you place in the bottom prevents the boogies from being sucked into your mouth (Yuck!). I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Small and convenient!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great and easy to carry in the diaper bag. One of the best I’ve used so far!
customer_reviews.author: KJ18

customer_reviews.title: I do feel like it works well
customer_reviews.text: I do feel like it works well... the tube kinks easily and the bag is a little bit small, so storing it isn't the easiest thing, but it IS nice that it comes with the bag to keep it in. I also store a small 10ml syringe for saline solution (or warm water) to help loosen boogers. My daughter hates it... but she'd probably hate any form of a snot sucker, so I can't say that's a negative :)
customer_reviews.author: nicolet1205

customer_reviews.title: Better options out there
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but I prefer way more the Nossa baby for it's sucking power.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: I have always thought that bulb syringes were useless but could never find a good alternative
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had gotten one of these sooner. I have always thought that bulb syringes were useless but could never find a good alternative. Now I'm happy to sayou that the search is over. This product is east to use, easy to clean, and effective. What more could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and effective in combination with the bayby saline solution. There is only one and acceptable minus which is that the tip will get loose after using it for a few months. Overall, I love the product.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: A must-have
customer_reviews.text: The best thing when you have a baby with a runny nose recommend call parents amazing product can't live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Junior Roman

customer_reviews.title: It seems gross, but it works
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for little kids who hate blowing their noses. Only downside is that its kinda gross. Nice that you don't need to buy filters and that a tissue is the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Boone

customer_reviews.title: This works GREAT! I know that it seems gross
customer_reviews.text: This works GREAT! I know that it seems gross, when you think about it, but you do not get any mucous in your mouth! This is the best suction device and has worked so well on our twin grandsons, who have been afflicted with RSV and other flem accumulating issues. We use it to suction the mouth and the nose. I highly recommend it. It's washable, and a more sanitary way to suction, than those old school suction bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: and the first time we used the bulb syringe was horrible. We definitely thought we were going to suck ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are new parents, and the first time we used the bulb syringe was horrible. We definitely thought we were going to suck our baby's brains out of his nose. We got this aspirator, and while still scary, it is a lot less scary and just as effective. Tip: use while the baby is sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: MrsV

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Love this, the newborn tip works so well to get the boogies and I like that you use tissue as a filter! Also easy to clean. I like it better than the Frida.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchkins

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I purchased this is a second one ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I purchased this is a second one for my second baby. I used the first one for my first kid until now he’s 4yrs old. Nosefida and this one I chose this one is way better.
customer_reviews.author: V.P

customer_reviews.title: I like it much better than the nose Frieda
customer_reviews.text: I like it much better than the nose Frieda. I had the Frieda first and this one was cheaper. I am glad I tried it because I like it better.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This nasal aspirator is the best aspirator I have used on our baby. Unlike the nasal aspirator issued by the hospital, it can be taken apart, washed out, and dried to prevent any mold or water build up. Unlike the Nose Frida, you are able to use a piece of tissue as the "filter." The ability to use any tissue as the filter keeps cost down as the filters for the Nose Frida can become quite costly over time. Also, you are able to control how much suction it needs to get any blocks out of your child's nose. I highly recommend this product to any parent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing - I have used it a few times now ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing - I have used it a few times now and swear by It! Super easy to use and like that you just use a Kleenex for the filter. Very easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey M.

customer_reviews.title: Off label use, but still works awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Baby Comfy Nose to use on my dog. Since you can't teach doggies to blow their noses this has been great for getting the snot out of her nose without scaring her to death. I can only imagine that it works equally well on babies. And I love that you only have to use a tissue as the filter. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Connie L

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The tube is a little long, I had to cut mine down. Other than that its convenient
customer_reviews.author: Ahli

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver !! A must have for congested babies !!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Works way better than suction bulbs. Easy to use and clean. Used it to clear my 8 month olds congestion and works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: merrick anthony

customer_reviews.title: BabyComfy Nasal Aspirator
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work well. All the pieces do not attach together tightly. They all fall apart from each other. Cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: TechGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 week old preemie son had caught rsv and when we left the childrens hospital I needed a better way to get his boogers out then the bulb the hospital gives and this worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sheanna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my newborn
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my newborn! I've been going crazy with the snot I kept hearing, and this made it possible to clear both of her nostrils! I'm a respiratory therapist, and this is the closest I find to the real thing we use at the hospital. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Small enough for a newborn
customer_reviews.text: I bought the nosefrida because I heard it was the thing to have. I went in search of something else because it didn't fit my babies little nostrils. I found this and I love it way more because this has two different size pieces that work great for small nostrils. I won't give it 5 stars because the tube bends at the base and doesn't allow me to suck air out so I have to make sure to keep it straight which is hard to do with a squirmy baby. My solution was taking the hard tube from the nosefrida and replacing it with this flimsy one. Now it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jackeline Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product unlike any other suction. Simple and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best purchases I've made. I use this for both of my boys, 4 year old and a 7 month old. It works great. I hate I didn't purchase it sooner. You won't be disappointed if you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Every parent must get this!!! Game changer. Super easy and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Adam Martin

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and a must for babies. Don’t have to buy filters either. Just use 1/3 of a tissue and some saline drops to clean baby’s nose.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Dz

customer_reviews.title: ... to use for minor runny noses and it works great. I do with there was an extra mouthpiece ...
customer_reviews.text: Have only needed to use for minor runny noses and it works great. I do with there was an extra mouthpiece so my husband and I would not have to wash the mouthpiece after every use to avoid spreading germs in the house.
customer_reviews.author: SWAGS

customer_reviews.title: I've used with my child and have given as gift ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used with my child and have given as gift multiple times. Have had NoseFrieda but I definitely prefer this because the tissue that you stuff inside catches all the gunk! (I've used half a Kleenex.)
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: No additional filter required. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Real edge of this product is that you don't need to buy an additional filter each and everytime you need to use it(unlike other brand). Clean tissue will do the work.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing. My baby doesn't get mad when I use it on him. After I'm done he gives me a big smile because he can breath normally again!
customer_reviews.author: Monique H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: This nasal aspirator works so well and is easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Scrappy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I'll never use a suction bulb again. Works great. Used a tissue as the filter, and have never got snot in my mouth, or even came close to. I'll recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: janice morden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my daughter. Beats the old traditional green suction we used for our previous 2 children.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: This is brilliant! Absolutely brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is brilliant! Absolutely brilliant! Buy it! Sadly, I lost a piece after a weekend away so will need to buy another but, my goodness, it's worth it - this is such a nifty gadget and it works so well!
customer_reviews.author: Tamsin D.

customer_reviews.title: BEST BABY SNOT REMOVER EVERRRRRRRRR
customer_reviews.text: Where the heck was this with my first born? No silly filters to buy and comes in a mesh bag so that it's always dried properly. My only hang up is that yes, the majority of the time the snot doesn't make it to the tissue filter. It just stays in the little nostril bulb. So I just blow it back out onto a spare tissue. Easy peasy and no more tears with this!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Iwancio

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I get them for anyone I know having a baby. They work way better than the electric ones you get from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fern McOmber Oram

customer_reviews.title: it's a lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works wonders! Gets a ton of snot out so baby can breath! Love that you can throw in dishwasher!! Would be best gift ever for expecting parents! A
customer_reviews.author: GraySkies

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend to anyone for all ages. Truly got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and seems pretty effective
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and seems pretty effective. Its much cheaper than the most popular brand and doesn't require you to pay for extra filters.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D.

customer_reviews.title: This works great for my baby
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my baby. I also have the nose frida, which also works well but I like the ComfyNose better.
customer_reviews.author: JCSF

customer_reviews.title: Best Nasal Aspirator on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Love this nasal aspirator. It works much better than another very popular one on the market (I have both and actually ordered 2 of the Baby Comfy Nose) and is easier to handle especially with a squirmy baby. So great that it has 2 different attachments for infant and baby.
customer_reviews.author: Act17

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have been using this on my newborn for a few weeks now. It is easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: stalloned

customer_reviews.title: Nasal aspirator
customer_reviews.text: Suction power isn't easy due to the tissue having to be used as s filter. Cleaning is easy and its easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I like it. My baby doesn't seem to fight it as much as the traditional ones but I still didn't see the 'big' improvement I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: M Sanders

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This thing ROCKS. The softer tip does make it less bothersome to the baby. I use it more than my nosefrida as of late.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon HZV

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for getting our babies nose clear
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for getting our babies nose clear! The bulb syringes did not do the job and with our daughter who has constant nose issues, it's very effective and I feel better knowing I can control the speed of the suction. A friend recommended this to me and I am so glad she did!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna F

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister to replace the bulb shaped ones you normally get that can end up getting moldy! She LOVES! Definitely mama and auntie approved!
customer_reviews.author: rachel f.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome help with babies!
customer_reviews.text: Especially with the smaller, pointier nose insertion piece, this nasal aspirator is a treasure. Seriously! Works excellently. Cheap enough to buy a new replacement if you lose one. And better than the nose frida IMO. It's still a little difficult, but much easier to suck effectively with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Weeks

customer_reviews.title: This is a God send!! May seem gross ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a God send!! May seem gross but you will be sorry if you have a child and do not have one of these!

customer_reviews.title: The best nasal aspirator so far
customer_reviews.text: The best nasal aspirator so far, but not using it when your kids get sore throat, you would get infected easily by this one. We changed to the battery aspirator when he's sick.
customer_reviews.author: Piggy mommy

product_meta.title: BabyComfy Nasal Aspirator - The Snotsucker - Hygienically & Safely Removes Baby’s Nasal Mucus (Clear)
product_meta.description:
Color:Clear

The Original Snot Sucker

BabyComfyNose Nasal Aspirator uses your own suction to remove nasal mucus safely and hygienically. Uses lightly-wadded tissue inside the aspirator to filter mucus and germs. The mesh pouch keeps pieces together in the diaper bag and the dishwasher. Two soft nose tips included: standard and newborn. Significantly more effective than bulb and battery-powered nasal aspirators. The 1# tested nasal aspirator recommended by baby guru Dr. Sears.
feature_bullets: SAFELY REMOVE NASAL MUCUS — The BabyComfy Nasal Aspirator uses your own suction to remove nasal mucus safely and hygienically. The suction power is limited only by the suction you can draw. Always safe for the parent and the child because you control the suction.

MORE EFFECTIVE — The parent-powered suction provides astonishingly effective mucus removal for your child’s congested nose. It is significantly more effective than bulb and battery-powered nasal aspirators.

FILTER MUCUS AND GERMS — No more buying expensive and ineffective filters! The nasal aspirator that is designed to use household tissue as a filter. Lightly wad tissue inside the aspirator to filter mucus and germs. The hygienic tissue filter system is superior to plastic foam rubber filters.

EASY STORAGE & DISHWASHER SAFE — The handy mesh pouch keeps all the parts together from your diaper bag to the dishwasher. Yes! The BabyComfy Nasal Aspirator is dishwasher safe and BPA & phthalate-free.
TWO NOSE TIPS INCLUDED — Two soft nose tip sizes are included to accommodate your growing baby: standard and newborn.
